attributes.additional_details: We, as A level students, feel that this pandemic has severely impacted our academics in a negative way. On top of our lack of adequate teacher support over the course of E learning students are suffering from additional stresses and pressures on top of mental illness which has developed during lockdown
attributes.background: cancel our A level exams, we have been placed at an extreme disadvantage missed a critical part of year 12 that we should've spent going over content but instead we now have less than a year to go over all the content. we are suffering severe stress and anxiety just trying to complete everything.
